name: Unfair Death Agency
description:
Warning: best experienced in Firefox

As an agent for the Unfair Death Agency, you are responsible for reviving those who didn't receive the most glorious deaths. Unfortunately, we only know the circumstances of their demise, not their personal names.

Armed with your own little encyclopedia, you will learn about the countries from which the deceased may have come from. You will have to use a lot of deduction to find which tomb to revive!

Instructions:

1. Use the (E key) to learn about the person's death.

2. Use the (TAB key) to learn about the countries where they could be coming from.

3. Comparing those clues to the names and dates on the tombs, find the grave where the person resides, and then revive them.
